items.title: Amazon Cyber Monday deals up to 52% off Samsung monitors now live: Odyssey gaming and Smart Monitors from just $80
items.summary:
Update 11/30: Samsung is offering fresh Cyber Monday offers directly at its online store as well now with savings of up to $1,000. More details in the original post below.

As part of its now live Cyber Monday sale event, Amazon is offering huge discounts on almost all Samsung monitors, including Odyssey gaming and Smart Monitor models. Many of these are either fresh lows or are back to their lowest prices, and you can save up to 52% by cashing in on these Black Friday prices. The sale even includes some of the newest displays, like this 27-inch Odyssey G60SF 500Hz OLED unit, and the prices for these monitors, believe it or not, are starting at just $80. Head below for a closer look at the deals.

more…

items.title: Anker updates its 2025 Black Friday sale with new deals: Lowest prices on Prime chargers, 25W Qi2 MagSafe stands, more
items.summary:
As part of the ongoing Cyber Monday sale, the official Anker storefront at Amazon is offering some solid discounts right now with notable price drops across its lineup of 2025 Prime charging stations, Nano power banks, MagSafe 25W Qi2 charging stands, and more. On top of the offers that went live last week, Anker has now added several new deals to the lineup, dropping its Qi2 2-in-1 charging stand and 240W 8-in-1 Prime charging station to their lowest prices yet. All these charging units are now up to 56% off for Black Friday. While many of these are matched directly at the Anker’s online store alongside other member perks and blind boxes, the Amazon storefront is offering deeper discounts on select items, as highlighted below.

items.title: Apple deals still live for Black Friday Weekend – AirPods 4 $69, M5 MacBook Pro $250 off, Apple Series 11/Ultra 3, iPads, more
items.summary:
Black Friday might have come and gone now, officially speaking, but the deals certainly haven’t. While there are a few notable discounts that have jumped back up price, by and large the best of the Apple deals are still live for Black Friday Weekend. Amazon did officially kick off its Cyber Monday event this morning and its carrying over some of the most notable deals we tracked yesterday, not the least of which is AirPods 4 down at an insane $69 shipped as well as the best price to date on the best earbuds you can buy, AirPods Pro 3. Those offers join ongoing all-time lows on the brand new M5 MacBook Pro at $250 off, M4 MacBook Air with at least $250 in savings, loads of iPad deals, and one of the best values in Black Friday Mac deals, the venerable M4 Mac mini from just $479. Of course, Apple Watch Series 11, Apple Watch Ultra 3, and the more affordable SE models are also joining the extended Black Friday party as well – scope everything out below

items.title: Anker’s epic 25W Qi2 3-in-1 MagSafe charging stand with display still down at $150 all-time low for Black Friday
items.summary:
As part of its now live Black Friday Week sale event, Anker’s official Amazon storefront is offering its latest 25W Qi2 3-in-1 MagSafe charging stand for $149.49 shipped. This is one of the newer models Anker debuted a couple of months back for $230, and it’s now seeing its steepest price drop yet. Today’s 35% discount takes $80 off its usual going rate, landing it $20 below its previous all-time low and our mention from last month. Both Phantom Gray and White variants have hit the $150 low today, and Anker’s online store is matching the price for them today at $150. It’s one of our favorite 25W Qi2 charging stations at the moment, and you can learn more about it in detail below.
